XXbsu006_u:226: ye bhikṣusaṅghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca //
XXbsu006_u:227: na pretakuṣmāṇḍamahoragāśca vighnaṃ na kurvanti kadāci teṣām /
XXbsu006_u:228: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham //
XXbsu006_u:229: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatairacintiyaiḥ /
XXbsu006_u:230: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutānacintiyā //
XXbsu006_u:231: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam /
XXbsu006_u:232: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam //
XXbsu006_u:233: kalyāṇamitraṃ mama mārgadarśako (yaṃ) sa āgatāye mama piṇḍapātikā /
XXbsu006_u:234: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyanti jarārtavyādhayā //
XXbsu006_u:235: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati ye tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam //
XXbsu006_u:236: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:239: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe /
XXbsu006_u:240: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
XXbsu006_u:242: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti /
XXbsu006_u:253: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santīti /
XXbsu006_u:254: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ
XXbsu006_u:260: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
XXbsu006_u:262: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:268: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
XXbsu006_u:270: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāśca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
XXbsu006_u:271: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt /
XXbsu006_u:272: mārgaṃ ca te darśayi agrabodhaye divyā manojñā madhurasvarāṃśca saṃśrāvayiṣyanti ca nityakālam
XXbsu006_u:273: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito
XXbsu006_u:275: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
XXbsu006_u:279: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
XXbsu006_u:281: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghrameva tad hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ
XXbsu006_u:282: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:284: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi /
XXbsu006_u:294: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
XXbsu006_u:297: 122) maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha
XXbsu006_u:300: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṅkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa
XXbsu006_u:301: atha so 'mātyastaṃ caṅkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
XXbsu006_u:302: kṛtaṃ mayā caṅkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvameva ca /
XXbsu006_u:303: sattvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvametat //
XXbsu006_u:304: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat sadevakam /
XXbsu006_u:305: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayamīdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti me dharmabhāṇako //
XXbsu006_u:306: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṅkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
XXbsu006_u:307: sa caṅkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasañcchādita taṃ ca bhūmim //
XXbsu006_u:308: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:309: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ pratinivṛtya tatraiva (Asv 123) kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:310: anyena keśānanyena nayānānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:311: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
XXbsu006_u:315: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:316: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt
XXbsu006_u:317: santrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭyan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha /
XXbsu006_u:320: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
XXbsu006_u:321: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanamīdṛśāni /
XXbsu006_u:322: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi /
XXbsu006_u:326: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ /
XXbsu006_u:334: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim /
XXbsu006_u:336: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:338: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:340: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṅgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham /
XXbsu006_u:343: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṅkramastenopasaṅkrāntau
XXbsu006_u:347: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti /
XXbsu006_u:354: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam /
XXbsu006_u:357: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṅkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha /
XXbsu006_u:360: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyamārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
XXbsu006_u:361: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam //
XXbsu006_u:363: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmyahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm /
XXbsu006_u:366: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
XXbsu006_u:367: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:371: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
XXbsu006_u:372: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram /
XXbsu006_u:374: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:375: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma /
XXbsu006_u:376: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ /
XXbsu006_u:379: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
XXbsu006_u:380: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya (Asv 127) /
XXbsu006_u:383: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:384: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayata /
XXbsu006_u:386: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan /
XXbsu006_u:387: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha /
XXbsu006_u:390: atra śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati
XXbsu006_u:391: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ /
XXbsu006_u:392: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ
XXbsu006_u:393: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṅkramate sma /
XXbsu006_u:394: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ
XXbsu006_u:395: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma /
XXbsu006_u:400: na me kadācidiha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
XXbsu006_u:402: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācidvrajate apāyabhūmim /
XXbsu006_u:403: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
XXbsu006_u:406: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:407: alabdhalābhā ye tatra mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu006_u:409: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi /
XXbsu006_u:410: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma /
XXbsu006_u:411: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni (Asv 129) kumbhāni paripūrayitavyāni /
XXbsu006_u:413: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni /
XXbsu006_u:414: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ /
XXbsu006_u:416: samyaksambuddhaḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanānandapūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputrapramukhairmahāśrāvakasaṅghaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ ajitasenasya rājño rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:417: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha /
XXbsu006_u:421: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān /
XXbsu006_u:422: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ /
XXbsu006_u:423: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti /
XXbsu006_u:433: mā vilamba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiñci yāsyasi /
XXbsu006_u:434: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham //

XXbsu006_u:439: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
XXbsu006_u:440: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
XXbsu006_u:441: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra (Asv 131) āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma /
XXbsu006_u:444: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /

XXbsu006_u:453: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu006_u:454: anāgate 'dhvanyaparimitaiḥ kalpairacintyairaparimāṇairajitaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
XXbsu006_u:459: (Asv 132) ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato
XXbsu006_u:462: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu006_u:464: aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu006_u:466: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye samprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu006_u:468: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisambuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisambhotsyante
XXbsu006_u:469: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
XXbsu006_u:471: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ samprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati
XXbsu006_u:473: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
XXbsu006_u:474: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ samprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu006_u:476: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam /
XXbsu006_u:486: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam /
XXbsu006_u:490: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepaṣyatha /
XXbsu006_u:493: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati /
XXbsu006_u:495: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmākrośiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyanti tebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu006_u:496: yaḥ sattvaḥ (Asv 134) trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet /
XXbsu006_u:497: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtradhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate /
XXbsu006_u:500: na came īdṛśaṃ sūtraṃ śrutapūrvaṃ kadācana //
XXbsu006_u:502: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam //

XXbsu006_u:510: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ niruttaraṃ mā paścakāle parinirvṛte jite /
XXbsu006_u:513: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāva prakāśitaṃ sutramidaṃ niruttaram /
XXbsu006_u:514: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyakā likhiṣyati sūtrametaṃ niruttaram //
XXbsu006_u:515: na cāpi so gacchati durgatībhayaṃ svargaṃ ca so gacchati kṣiprametat //

XXbsu006_u:525: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyaka rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi ha sūtraratne //
